content.title: Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum
content.description: Vascular manifestations of PXE, a disorder of elastic fiber mineralization

key_concepts.details: Autosomal recessive mutations in ABCC6 gene causing ectopic mineralization
Premature atherosclerosis, intermittent claudication at young age
Coronary artery disease, mitral valve prolapse, restrictive cardiomyopathy
Arterial wall calcification, particularly affecting small and medium arteries

content.clinical_significance: Classic triad: skin lesions, ocular angioid streaks, cardiovascular disease
content.statement: Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Genetic-Disorders that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum.
